titleStmt.title: Two speeches spoken by Sir Simonds D'Ewes the first touching the Antiquity of Cambridge lately published by Iohn Thomas, with many ignorant and foolish mistakes which are here rectified : the other concerning the priviledge of Parliament in causes civill and criminall.
Speeches. Selections
titleStmt.author: D'Ewes, Simonds, Sir, 1602-1650.
